DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess energy expenditure intensity High Intensity Functional Training ( HIFT ) session overweight obese adult men woman .
DOC.brief_title: Energy Expenditure High Intensity Functional Training
DOC.detailed_description: High Intensity Functional Training ( HIFT ) , alternate short period intense exercise use varied , multiple-joint movement , less-intense active recovery period , may offer attractive , time efficient alternative traditional aerobic exercise . Variations HIFT Cross Fit , home workout video ( ie.P90x Insanity ) , boot-camp style group exercise class become increasingly popular . The cardiovascular benefit HIFT demonstrate ; however , study researcher hope get information regard potential effectiveness HIFT weight management , actual level energy expenditure exercise intensity elicit HIFT session .
DOC.criteria: Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 25.0 39.9 Currently participate HIFT ( bootcamp ) class Kirmayer Fitness Center
